text:
Accompanied my mom to visit Doctor Wee annually at Mount Elizabeth Medical Centre for many years.
A nice and caring doctor with 2 friendly and helpful staff at the clinic.

Dr Weeâ€™s straightforward yet empathetic approach helped me feel so comfortable and valued as a patient. It has instilled great confidence in me that I am in capable hands.
He is able to convey complex medical information in a clear and concise manner â€“ these are truly outstanding qualities as a breast surgeon! Thank you for your comforting presence and my beacon of light!
Dr Wee is supported by an incredible team of nurses- Chris and Zakia. Their kindness, their patience has been so instrumental in my cancer journey, offering invaluable support, care and guidance every step of the way. Thank you for your tireless efforts and going above and beyond to touch lives! Please accept my utmost gratitude ðŸ˜Š
My special heartfelt appreciations to Chris, for your presence in my life and for walking alongside me all these years and continuing to do so; I am so incredibly fortunate.
I wish you all well and happy, always!
I called to inquire about the rates and types of biopsies. The lady who answered my call gave such detailed and clear explanation. It gives me a lot of assurances.
Wonderful with my family. Thank you Dr. Wee, and also Christina!
